name: three_hourly
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool foreca_weather.
Tool description: Everything you need to build a weather app
API description: Fetches a three-hourly weather forecast for a given location up to 14 days, with optional historical data and various configurable parameters.

location.description: The location for which to fetch the weather forecast.

history.description: Whether to include 24 hours of past data. Defaults to None.

tz.description: Time zone in the response, specified using IANA time zone database names. Defaults to 'Europe/London'.

dataset.description: The variable set to use in the response. Defaults to 'full'.

tempunit.description: The temperature unit in the response (e.g., 'C' for Celsius). Defaults to 'C'.

alt.description: The altitude in meters. Defaults to 0.

periods.description: The number of time steps in the response, with a default of 8 and a maximum of 12. Defaults to 8.

windunit.description: The wind speed unit in the response (e.g., 'MS' for meters per second). Defaults to 'MS'.
